# ALVR Vendored Changes (Wavry)

Pinned commit: `1a4194ff137937c0a4f416ad2d6d1acedb851e8a`

This directory is a **vendored subset**. Wavry does **not** modify ALVR logic. The only change
applied during vendoring is the addition of a two-line attribution header to each source file:

```text
// Derived from ALVR (MIT)
// Original copyright preserved
```

The header is inserted by `scripts/vendor_alvr.sh` for the following files:

```
third_party/alvr/alvr/client_openxr/src/c_api.rs
```
